name: summy
description: Context management middleware for LLM conversations

scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,client,rag -c blue,green,magenta "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:rag"
scripts.kill: taskkill /F /IM node.exe /T 2>nul || echo No node processes found
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client && npm run build:mcp && npm run build:rag
scripts.postinstall: cd mcp-server && npx playwright install chromium
